content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 > find kits in our web shop 1 this cowl is versatile and allows you to play with colours in a variety of ways looking at it brings back childhood memories of visiting the montreal exposition of 1967 many of the pavilions on the site of the exposition used geometry as building blocks even if you are accustomed to cabling without a needle consider using one here balancing two colours in your crossings can make it harder to maintain your gauge while you work meanwhile make sure to use a removable marker for your beginning of round as it will be moved frequently throughout the pattern this cowl is worked up in our hand-dyed house brand bon tricot in jolly dk a custom spun base of bfl with a hint of gotland which blooms beautifully when blocked 1 https //www espacetricot com/us/expo-67-cowl-kit html
